IndexPage.headerTitle: Streamline Your Business with Chatbots and Automation
IndexPage.headerDescription: Boost Customer Engagement and Drive Sales with AI-Powered Chatbots and Automation Solutions
IndexPage.title: Elevate Your Sales WIth Our AI Sales Assistant
IndexPage.description: Ollabot, your AI-powered digital sales associate, enhances your online store's performance and customer satisfaction across all chat channels.
IndexPage.sub-description: AI-Powered Sales Assistant for Your Online Store
IndexPage.features1-text: Save time with seamless handling of order tracking, cancellations, refunds, and complete workflow management from start to finish.
IndexPage.features2-text: Seamlessly connect with all your chat channels, including CRMs, Instagram DMs, email, and more, for streamlined communication
IndexPage.features3-text: Experience the comfort and ease of interacting with a helpful sales associate, reminiscent of physical stores, not just a traditional text chatbot.
IndexPage.pricing-title: Don't Miss Out on the Exceptional and Tailored Experience Offered by Your Sales Assistant!
IndexPage.pricing-description: Begin Crafting Your Custom AI Assistant with Ollabot and Gain Access to the Information You Require, Anytime, Anywhere.

PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).

KnowledgePage.title: Upload Knowledge
KnowledgePage.description: Upload your documents, CSV, or links to train your bot.
KnowledgePage.loading: Your knowledge base is being updated, please do not leave the page and wait for the file to upload...
KnowledgePage.successLinks: Success! Links upserted. Please wait a minute for the changes to reflect.
KnowledgePage.successDocuments: Success! Documents upserted. Please wait a minute for the changes to reflect.
KnowledgePage.tooltip:
## Quick Tips for Managing Your Chatbot's Knowledge Base

**Real-time Updates**: Adding files and links immediately enhances your bot's knowledge.

### Key Steps
1. **Upload Files**: Go to the Knowledge Base section and upload DOC, MD, CSV, or TXT files.
2. **Add Links**: Input URLs to add web content to your bot's knowledge base. You can crawl multiple links, with a limit of 50 links.
3. **Update Regularly**: Keep your knowledge base accurate by regularly adding and updating sources.

**Note**: Please wait for 3-5 minutes depending on the scale of your files/links before the changes can be seen in your chatbot in the Customization panel.

**Warning**: You can reset your knowledge base through the reset panel. Be careful as this action cannot be undone.

Read more in our guide [here](https://app.ollabot.com/docs/bot-dashboard/knowledge).
KnowledgePage.footer: Are you sure you want to reset your knowledge base?
KnowledgePage.resetKnowledgeBaseDescription: This action will reset your knowledge base. This cannot be undone.

LinkCard.title: Website
LinkCard.description: Start crawling from the given URL to gather all associated links (excluding files).
LinkCard.gatherLinks: This will gather all links starting from the provided URL, ignoring any file links on the site.
LinkCard.successLinks: Success! Links upserted. Please wait a minute for the changes to reflect.

Dropzone.supportedFiles: We support only certain file types up to a maximum size. Drag and drop your file in one go.
Dropzone.fileLimitError: Please limit file uploads to a certain number of files.
Dropzone.dataLimitError: Total file size limit exceeded. Maximum allowed size is enforced.
Dropzone.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Expected certain file types.

SettingsPage.heading: Customization
SettingsPage.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for your bot here...
SettingsPage.settingsUpdating: Your settings are being updated, please wait for the file to upload...
SettingsPage.tooltip:
## Quick Tips for Customizing Your Chatbot

**Real-time Updates**: Changes to **Bot Name**, **Company Name**, **Company Logo**, and **Avatar Logo** update immediately.

### Key Customization Elements
1. **Company Logo**: Upload a logo for branding.
2. **Company Name**: Display your company name for identification.
3. **Bot Name**: Choose a name representing your brand.
4. **Avatar Logo**: Set an image for the chatbot's avatar.

### Chatbot Settings
1. **Description**: Provide an overview of the chatbot's role. Include specific instructions for better accuracy.
2. **Welcome Message**: Set an initial message for users.
3. **Creativity**: Control response creativity (0 to 1).
4. **Tone**: Define the chatbot's personality (e.g., Professional, Casual).

### Save Changes
- Click **Save Changes** and refresh to apply.

### Test Your Chatbot
- Interact with the chatbot to see real-time changes.



Read more in our guide [here](https://app.ollabot.com/docs/bot-dashboard/customization).
SettingsPage.resetConfirmationDescription: This action will reset your knowledge base. This cannot be undone.
